addCharacterTooltip: Add a character to the scene.
calloutPlaceCommandsAtTop: Place commands to set up your game at the top
calloutCharactersMove: These new commands let you control how the characters move
calloutPutCommandsTouchCharacter: Put a command here to have it happen when you touch a character
calloutClickCategory: Click a category header to see commands in each category
calloutTryOutNewCommands: Try out all the new commands you’ve unlocked
changeScoreTooltip: Přidat nebo odebrat bod ze skóre.
dropletBlock_addCharacter_description: Add a character to the scene.
dropletBlock_addCharacter_param0_descrip: The type of the character to be added ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_changeScore_description: Přidat nebo odebrat bod ze skóre.
dropletBlock_changeScore_param0_descript: The value to add to the score (negative values will reduce the score).
dropletBlock_moveRight_description: Moves the character to the right.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_description: Changes a set of characters to move slowly.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_moveNormal_description: Changes a set of characters to move at a normal speed.
dropletBlock_moveNormal_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_moveFast_description: Changes a set of characters to move quickly.
dropletBlock_moveFast_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The name of the sound to play.
dropletBlock_setBackground_param0_descri: The name of the background theme ('background1', 'background2', or 'background3').
dropletBlock_setBot_param0_description: The name of the bot image ('random', 'bot1', or 'bot2').
dropletBlock_setSpritePosition_descripti: Okamžitě přesune aktéra na zadané místo.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param0_descriptio: The index (starting at 0) indicating which actor should change.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param1_descriptio: The name of the actor image.
dropletBlock_setToChase_description: Changes a set of characters to chase the bot.
dropletBlock_setToChase_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToFlee_description: Changes a set of characters to flee from the bot.
dropletBlock_setToFlee_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToRoam_description: Changes a set of characters to roam freely.
dropletBlock_setToRoam_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToStop_description: Changes a set of characters to stop moving.
dropletBlock_setToStop_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setMap_description: Changes the map in the scene.
dropletBlock_setMap_param0_description: The name of the map ('random', 'blank', 'circle', 'circle2', 'horizontal', 'grid', or 'blobs').
dropletBlock_whenDown_description: This function executes when the down button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenLeft_description: This function executes when the left button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenRight_description: This function executes when the right button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenTouchCharacter_descript: This function executes when the character touches any character.
dropletBlock_whenTouchObstacle_descripti: This function executes when the character touches any obstacle.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMan_description: This function executes when the character touches man characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchPilot_description: This function executes when the character touches pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchPig_description: This function executes when the character touches pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchBird_description: This function executes when the character touches bird characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMouse_description: This function executes when the character touches mouse characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchRoo_description: This function executes when the character touches roo characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchSpider_description: This function executes when the character touches spider characters.
dropletBlock_whenUp_description: This function executes when the up button is pressed.
finalLevel: Dobrá práce! Vyřešil si poslední hádanku.
makeProjectileTooltip: Nechat střelu narazit a zmizet nebo odrazit.
makeYourOwn: Vytvořit si vlastní hru v Hravé laboratoři
moveDistanceTooltip: Přemístit herce určenou vzdálenost ve specifickém směru.
nextLevel: Dobrá práce! Dokončil jsi tuto hádanku.
numBlocksNeeded: Tato hádanka může být vyřešena pomocí %1 bloků.
onEventTooltip: Spustit kód v reakci na konkrétní událost.
positionOutTopRight: na pozici nad horní pravou pozicí
positionOutBottomLeft: na pozici pod spodní levou pozicí
positionOutBottomRight: na pozici pod spodní pravou pozicí
reinfFeedbackMsg: Můžete stisknou tlačítko "{backButton}" pro návrat k přehrání vašeho příběhu.
repeatForeverTooltip: Provést akce v tomto bloku opakovaně, pokud je spuštěn příběh.
setItemSpeedTooltip: Nastaví se rychlost pro skupinu položek
setScoreTextTooltip: Nastaví text, který se má zobrazit v oblasti pro výsledek.
setSpritePositionTooltip: Okamžitě přesune aktéra na zadané místo.
setMapTooltip: Changes the map in the scene
shareStudioTwitter: Zkontrolujte si příběh, který si udělal. Napsal jsem to sám s @codeorg
showCoordinatesTooltip: zobrazí souřadnice hlavní postavy na obrazovce
showTitleScreenTooltip: Zobrazit úvodní obrazovka s přípojeným názvem a textem.
startSetVars: game_vars (název, podnázev, pozadí, cíl, nebezpečí, hráč)
waitParamsTooltip: Čeká se zadaný počet sekund nebo se použijte nula pro čekání na výskyt klepnutí.
waitTooltip: Čeká se zadané množství času nebo dokud nedojde ke klepnutí.
whenArrowTooltip: Provést zadané níže uvedené akce po stisknutí klávesy se šipkou.
whenDownTooltip: Spusťte níže uvedené akce, když je stisknutá klávesa "dolů".
whenGameStartsTooltip: Provést níže uvedené akce, když příběh začne.
whenLeftTooltip: Spusťte níže uvedené akce, když je stisknutá klávesa "vlevo".
whenRightTooltip: Spusťte níže uvedené akce, když je stisknutá klávesa "vpravo".
whenSpriteClickedTooltip: Provést níže uvedené akce po klepnutí na aktéra.
whenSpriteCollidedTooltip: Provést níže uvedené akce, když se aktér dotkne jiného herce.
whenTouchItemTooltip: Provést níže uvedené akce, když aktér se dotkne položky.
whenTouchWallTooltip: Provést akce níže uvedené, když aktér se dotkne položky.
whenUpTooltip: Spusť uvedené akce když je stisknutá klávesa "nahoru".
failedHasSetBotSpeed: Next time, set a bot speed.
failedTouchAllItems: Next time, get all the items.
failedScoreMinimum: Next time, reach the minimum score.
failedRemovedItemCount: Next time, get the right number of items.
failedSetActivity: Next time, set the correct character activity.
calloutPutCommandsHereRunStart: Put commands here to have them run when the program starts
calloutClickEvents: Click on the events header to see event function blocks.
calloutUseArrowButtons: Hold down these buttons or the arrow keys on your keyboard to trigger the move events
calloutRunButton: Add a moveRight command to your code and then click here to run it
calloutShowCodeToggle: Click here to switch between block and text mode
calloutShowPlaceGoUpHere: Place goUp command here to move up
calloutShowPlaySound: It's your game, so you choose the sounds now. Try the dropdown to pick a different sound
calloutInstructions: Don't know what to do? Click the instructions to see them again
calloutPlaceTwo: Can you make two MOUSEs appear when you get a BIRD?
calloutSetMapAndSpeed: Set the map and your speed.
dropletBlock_addPoints_param0_descriptio: The value to add to the score.
dropletBlock_removePoints_param0_descrip: The value to remove from the score.
dropletBlock_endGame_param0_description: Whether the game was won or lost ('win', 'lose').
dropletBlock_whenGetCharacter_descriptio: This function executes when the character gets any character.
dropletBlock_whenGetMan_description: This function executes when the character gets man characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetPilot_description: This function executes when the character gets pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetPig_description: This function executes when the character gets pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetBird_description: This function executes when the character gets bird characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetMouse_description: This function executes when the character gets mouse characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetRoo_description: This function executes when the character gets roo characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetSpider_description: This function executes when the character gets spider characters.
failedAvoidHazard: "Uh oh, a GUY got you!  Try again."
failedHasAllGoals: "Try again, BOTX.  You can get it."
failedTwoItemsTimeout: You need to get the pilots before time runs out. To move, put the goUp and goDown commands inside the whenUp and whenDown functions. Then, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move quickly.
failedFourItemsTimeout: To pass this level, you'll need to put goLeft, goRight, goUp and go Down into the right functions. If your code looks correct, but you can't get there fast enough, try pressing and holding the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedScoreTimeout: Try to reach all the pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedScoreScore: You got the pilots, but you still don't have enough points to pass the level. Use the addPoints command to add 100 points when you get a pilot.
failedScoreGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you put it inside the whenGetPilot function so BOT1 can't get points until he gets a pilot?
failedWinLoseTimeout: Try to reach all the pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseScore: You got the pilots, but you still don't have enough points to pass the level. Use the addPoints command to add 100 points when you get a pilot. Use removePoints to subtract 100 when you touch a MAN. Avoid the MANs!
failedWinLoseGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you make it so that the command is only called when you get the pilot? Also, remove points when you touch the MAN.
failedAddCharactersTimeout: Use three addCharacter commands at the top of your program to add PIGs when you hit run. Now go get them.
failedChainCharactersTimeout: You need to get 8 MOUSEs. They move fast. Try pressing and holding the keys on your keyboard (or screen) to chase them.
failedChainCharactersScore: You got the MOUSEs, but you don't have enough points to move to the next level. Can you add 100 points to your score every time you get a MOUSE?
failedChainCharactersItems: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place.  Can you make it so that the command is only called when you get the MOUSEs?
failedChainCharacters2Timeout: You need to get 8 MOUSEs. Can you make two (or more) of them appear every time you get a ROO?
failedChangeSettingSettings: Make the level your own. To pass this level, you need to change the map and set your speed.
